attributes.comment:
I oppose the fee increase by USCIS. If IRS can handle millions of tax returns
efficiently and timely every year, why can not USCIS do the same with even lesser
number of immigration petitions? President Bush must stop political appointments
at USCIS helm and choose a competent administrator to run it in a more
streamlined, efficient manner.

Why should I pay for the lapse of processing by DOL (backlog elimination centers,
what a poor idea) and other agencies? Immigrants money is wasted on outside
contractors and bloated employee expenses. Let us trim that fat first. Let us focus
on some real performance measurements at USCIS instead of gimmicks which
show reduced backlog.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
